name: Threat Intelligence Platform
description: Full-featured platform that curates cybersecurity RSS feeds, news, and articles into actionable intelligence. Generates concise reports from single or multiple sources, extracts IOCs, verifies detection coverage, produces CTI-ready JSON output with hunting queries, and auto-publishes to the team wiki — all in one workflow.
impact: Adopted as the team's primary analysis platform — unified threat intelligence workflow across 12 analysts, replacing 4 separate tools
